thread.title: BREAKING: Trump Fires Back After Judge Halts “Travel Ban”, Files to Appeal
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Trump Fires Back After Judge Halts “Travel Ban”, Files to Appeal

author: John S. Roberts
title: BREAKING: Trump Fires Back After Judge Halts “Travel Ban”, Files to Appeal

organizations.name: u.s. district court of the western district

text:
Quick recap… 
First, President Trump signs an executive order barring residents from seven Muslim-majority nations from entering America for 90 days to ensure the U.S. can properly vet these people. 
Next, a Seattle judge appointed by former President George W. Bush halted the “travel ban” nationwide, effective immediately. 
Now, the Trump administration just fired back by filing an appeal. 
From NBC News : 
The Trump administration on Saturday filed a notice of appeal indicating it intends to challenge a federal judge’s ruling that blocked President Donald Trump’s executive order that temporarily blocked entry to the U.S. of those from seven predominantly Muslim nations. 
The notice was filed in the U.S. District Court of the Western District of Washington. It comes a day after a federal judge in Seattle issued a temporary restraining order that blocked the Trump travel restrictions. 
The notice is not the appeal itself. The White House press secretary on Friday said the administration would seek an emergency stay against Judge James L. Robart’s restraining order, and defended the travel restrictions as legal. 
Well, this likely isn’t the end of this “Muslim Ban” situation. 
(It’s not a Muslim ban, to be clear. If it were, more than seven Muslim-majority nations would be “banned.” It just so happens that radical Islam has a firm grip in the seven barred nations.) 
Stay tuned for further updates. 
If 45’s first two weeks in office are any indication, it’s going to be a crazy four years. LIKE this article?
